about_the_game:
World of Zento

Are you feeling bored? Want to try something new, but it also brings back the old, true good feeling from when you were a child?
Come to the Tetron planet, where all this beautifully magical pixel art journey begins.
Zento is the first area you'll encounter on your journey to Tetron. Explore this land with its Tomomons and uncover its many mysteries.
  • Exploring beautiful and colorful pixel art world. (It's actually running around and doing nothing.)
  • Travelling across multiple types of environment to discover the lore and the monsters species. (Typical Monster taming gerne, lol.)
  • Gather valuable materials to craft new items and foods for your Tomomon. (See, your slaves want your food.)
  • Building, customizing your own secret base. (Build a nice house to enslave more!!)


The TOMOMONs

Tomomon are creatures that inhabit the entire planet of Tetron, having appeared and existed for a very long time. Each species of creature has its own unique characteristics, origins, and abilities.
  • Enslaving and taming over 200+ Tomomons and making them battle to eternity.
  • Riding them around the big world of Tetron. (or let 'em ride you...)
  • Discovering and forcing Tomomons to evolve for the power!
  • Exploring the Tomomon Fusion for the new power to reach a higher position in society.
  • Interacting with them to manipulate them to get rewards and bonuses.

The Challenge

Embark on an epic journey of discovery across Tetron and be a true Tomomon Tamer master.
  • Bullying weak tamers to earn the victory and become the champion of Zento.
  • Matching up skills to make new strategy to win the engaging 3v3 turn-based battle.
  • If your build is not effective enough, you will get bullied by the Guardians, Elites, or the Boss. So be warned!
detailed_description:
Early Access Gift


Update Notes

New Features Updates/Changes:

  • More new Tomomons.

  • Exotic - Exolink - Exodian Forms.

  • Early Access Gift: Only in Early Access Peroid.

  • New crazy Characters and Storylines.

  • More Tomomon Fusion.

  • Modify Tomomon's Chipsets.

  • Explore the Expedition Mode.

  • Play Gachapon (No Microtransaction).

  • And many more...

name: Tomomon: Legacy of Light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Experience the best of both worlds with our monster taming game - relive the nostalgia of classic role-play games, while enjoying fresh and immersive gameplay. Capture and train unique monsters in stunning environments, and put your skills to the test in challenging 3v3 battles.
